commitResults.messageBody:
Changed the name of chatbot from Duke to Hamyo.

Implemented skeletal version of chatbot that simply greets the user and exits.

Chatbot echos commands entered by user, and exits when user types the command "bye".

HAMYO logo changed to a minimalistic version.

Added functions to printLine() and printLogo() to improve readability.

Gave chatbot the ability to store whatever text entered by user via "add [item]" command.

Gave chatbot the ability to display text back to the user when requested via "list" command.

Gave chatbot the ability to mark tasks as done.
Gave chatbot the ability to change the task status back to not done.
Task class to represent a task. Possible children include ToDos, Deadlines and Events.
Added support for tracking ToDo (no time/ date attached), Deadline (done before specific date/ time), Events (occurs between two specific date/time).
Added Automated Text UI Testing for simple test cases (3 tasks types) and exceptions.

Added HamyoException to represent exceptions specific to Hamyo.

Gave chatbot the ability to handle errors caused by incorrect user input such as missing, incomplete or invalid fields.

Added test cases for A-TextUiTesting.

Gave chatbot the ability to delete tasks from the list.

Used collections ArrayList to store Tasks instead of normal Java Array.

Added test cases for delete.
Implement Enums (TODO, DEADLINE, EVENT) for message passing for task types during call to add task.

Gave chatbot the ability to save the tasks in the hard disk automatically whenever the task list changes.

Gave chatbot the ability to load the data from the hard disk when the chatbot starts up.

Added toFileFormat method for Tasks for easier file storage.

Added test cases for to test for loading and storing of data.
Changed if-else statements to switch to limit magic numbers.

# Conflicts:
#	src/main/java/Hamyo.java

Resolution: change if-else logic to switch, implement loadData() and saveData().

Added support for Date in Deadline and Events.

Updated test cases.

Added support for DateTime in Deadline and Events on top of Date.

Updated test cases.

Gave chatbot the ability to list tasks that fall on the specified date using the command "listDate yyyy-mm-dd".

Added occursToday() method in Task to return true if the Task occurs on the specified date and false otherwise.

Added test cases for listDate.

* branch-Level-8:
  Add listDate
  Add DateTime Support
  Implement Level 8

Implemented OOP for UI.

Changed Hamyo from static to instance.
Implemented OOP for Storage.

Implemented OOP for TaskList.

Fixed bug where tasks marked in storage outputs extra texts upon chatbot start up.

Updated test cases for tasks marked in storage.
Implemented more OOP for UI. Print statements moved to UI class.
Implemented OOP for Parser. Added run method to main.

* branch-oop-refactor:
  Implement Parser
  Implement UI
  Implement TaskList
  Implement Storage
  Use More OOP

Divided classes into packages Hamyo.Misc and Hamyo.Tasks.

Miscellaneous package contains Parser, Storage, UI, HamyoException.

Hamyo package contains Task, Deadline, Event, ToDo, TaskList, TaskType.

* branch-packages:
  Implement Packages

* add-gradle-support:
  build.gradle: Prevent generating a second JAR file
  Bump gradle and lib version
  Add Gradle support
